tool_description: Alpha Amazon Data Scraper allows you to gain access to do amazon's search queries, check pricing, sales, ranks and reviews in JSON format.
name: Alpha Amazon Scrapper
title: Alpha Amazon Scrapper

api_list.name: Get Amazon Search Results
api_list.description: This allows you to search any products from the amazon webpage.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://alpha-amazon-scrapper.p.rapidapi.com/search/eioneiijnjeoi"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "alpha-amazon-scrapper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://alpha-amazon-scrapper.p.rapidapi.com/search/{searchquery}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "alpha-amazon-scrapper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
